SOTMeasles-AFRO-MRCIFAFRO Measles Case Investigation QuestionnaireQuestionnairehttp://worldhealthorganization.github.io/smart-ot/Questionnaire/SOTMeasles-AFRO-MRCIF#0.2.1
investigationFormMeasles/ rubella suspected case investigation form for immediate reporting0..1group
descriptionComplete this form for: health facility / district to the national level0..1display
reportingSourceFor Official Use Only -to be completed by the district / national team0..1group

localityReporting District0..1string
DateReportedNationalDate the form was received at national level0..1date
demographicsIDENTIFICATION:0..1group
nameName of Patient0..1string
DoBDate of Birth0..1date
ageOnsetIf date of birth is unknown, age0..1integer
sexSex0..1choiceValue Set: SOT Biological Sex
addressAddress0..1string
localityTypeUrban/Rural0..1choiceValue Set: SOT Measles Locality Type
vaccinationStatusVACCINATION STATUS:0..*group
vaccineTypeType of Vaccine received0..1choiceValue Set: SOT Measles Vaccine Type
noOfDosesNumber of measles containing vaccine doses received in routine EPI and/or SIAs -valid values: 1 - 4 doses0..1choiceValue Set: SOT Measles No Of Doses
lastDoseDateDate of last dose0..1date
caseInvestigationCASE INVESTIGATION:0..*group
dateReportedDate case was notified to the district0..1date
DateOfConsultationDate Of case investigation0..1date
rashOnsetDateDate of rash onset0..1date
clinicalClinical HISTORY:0..1group
feverFever0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
rashGeneralized Rash0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
coughCough0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
conjunctivitisRed Eyes0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
coryzaRunning nose0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
lymphadenopathySwollen lymph nodes behind ears0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
jointPainJoint pain/swelling0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
admittedIn/out-patient0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
outcomeOutcome0..1choiceValue Set: Patient Clinical Course Outcome
travelledOutsideHistory of travel outside the village/ town/ district in last 7 - 21 days before onset of rash0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
infectionSettingMost probable place of exposure to measles/ rubella: district0..1string
classificationFINAL CLASSIFICATION:0..1group
finalClassificationFinal Classification0..1choiceValue Set: FinalClassification
reportedByPerson Completing the form: Name0..1string
laboratoryResultsFOR SUSPECTED MEASLES/ RUBELLA CASES WITH LAB SPECIMENS0..1group
sampleTypeSpecimen source0..1choiceValue Set: Sample Type
collectionDateDate specimen obtained0..1date
specimenSentDateDate specimen was sent to lab0..1date
specimenReceivedDateDate Received0..1date

item.text: Measles/ rubella suspected case investigation form for immediate reporting
Complete this form for: health facility / district to the national level
For Official Use Only -to be completed by the district / national team
Date the form was received at national level
If date of birth is unknown, age
Number of measles containing vaccine doses received in routine EPI and/or SIAs -valid values: 1 - 4 doses
Date case was notified to the district
History of travel outside the village/ town/ district in last 7 - 21 days before onset of rash
Most probable place of exposure to measles/ rubella: district
FOR SUSPECTED MEASLES/ RUBELLA CASES WITH LAB SPECIMENS
Date specimen was sent to lab
